column3: - Trade shards with a Hiker in the Vermilion City Fanclub to obtain a Fossil Pokémon.
- The fossils that you find in Mt. Moon/Pewter City can be revived by a Scientist in the same building.
- That Hiker can sell you the other Fossil Pokémon that you didn't choose in Mt. Moon.
- For Galarian Fossil Pokémon, refer to the "Grass & Caves" and "Raid Dens" tabs.
